# Example: Generated paper_config.yaml

This is an example of what Dakini generates when scanning a typical project structure.

```yaml
# Paper Generation Configuration
# Auto-generated by Dakini on 2026-02-10 16:45:00

generation:
  mode: modular
  auto_detect_modules: true
  depth: comprehensive

modules:
  - name: crew_forge
    path: src/nikhil/amsha/crew_forge
    description: "Core orchestration framework with repository pattern"
    priority: critical
    include_in_final: true
    focus_areas:
      - repository_pattern
      - clean_architecture
      - mongodb_integration
  
  - name: output_process
    path: src/nikhil/amsha/output_process
    description: "Three-stage evaluation pipeline with weighted scoring"
    priority: critical
    include_in_final: true
    focus_areas:
      - evaluation_algorithms
      - statistical_grading
  
  - name: crew_monitor
    path: src/nikhil/amsha/crew_monitor
    description: "Performance tracking for CPU, GPU, memory usage"
    priority: high
    include_in_final: true
    focus_areas:
      - performance_monitoring
      - resource_tracking
  
  - name: llm_factory
    path: src/nikhil/amsha/llm_factory
    description: "Multi-provider LLM instantiation"
    priority: medium
    include_in_final: true
    focus_areas:
      - factory_pattern
      - provider_abstraction
  
  - name: utils
    path: src/nikhil/amsha/utils
    description: "Shared utilities for YAML/JSON parsing"
    priority: low
    include_in_final: false
    focus_areas:
      - parsing_utilities

exclusions:
  skip_test_files: true
  skip_example_files: true
  skip_init_files: true

output:
  base_dir: docs/paper
  modules_dir: ${base_dir}/modules
  cross_module_dir: ${base_dir}/cross_module
  final_draft: ${base_dir}/drafts/FINAL_JOURNAL_REPORT.md

analysis:
  mathematics:
    min_algorithms_per_module: 1
    include_complexity_analysis: true
  architecture:
    min_diagrams_per_module: 2
    diagram_types:
      - class_diagram
      - sequence_diagram

quality:
  min_latex_equations: 10  # 5 modules × 2
  min_diagrams: 10         # 5 modules × 2
  min_identified_gaps: 15   # 5 modules × 3

verification:
  cross_check_variable_names: true
  verify_all_code_references: true
```

## What Dakini Detected

- **5 modules** total
- **2 critical** (crew_forge, output_process)
- **1 high** (crew_monitor)
- **1 medium** (llm_factory)
- **1 low** (utils) - excluded from final paper by default

## Priority Detection Logic Applied

| Module | Priority | Reason |
|:-------|:---------|:-------|
| crew_forge | Critical | Contains `repository.py` and Protocol usage |
| output_process | Critical | Contains `processor.py` with complex algorithms |
| crew_monitor | High | Contains `manager.py` for orchestration |
| llm_factory | Medium | Contains `factory.py` pattern |
| utils | Low | Contains `utils.py` helper functions |
